summary: Dr. Hugh L. Preas, II, M.D., was charged with immoral and unprofessional conduct in the practice of medicine, including sexual harassment, disruptive behavior towards female staff, and inappropriate relationships. His license was immediately suspended for a minimum of fifteen business days, requiring enrollment in a rehabilitation program. Upon termination of suspension, he will be placed on two years probation, requiring a professional workplace behavior tutorial and a $10,000 civil fine.
